# firewalla-msp_rules (Data Source)

Data source for fetching Firewalla Rules

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "firewalla-msp_rules" "fetch_allowed_outbound_rules" {
  query = "box.id:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 action:allow direction:outbound"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `query` (String) Filter Rules by query

### Read-Only

- `rules` (Attributes List) List of Rules (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rules))

<a id="nestedatt--rules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rules`

Read-Only:

- `action` (String)
- `direction` (String)
- `gid` (String)
- `hit` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rules--hit))
- `id` (String)
- `scope` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rules--scope))
- `status` (String)
- `target` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rules--target))

<a id="nestedatt--rules--hit"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rules.hit`

Read-Only:

- `count` (Number)
- `last_hit_ts` (Number)
